content:
I'm getting the following error from the IG publisher at the end of the build:

Internal error in location for message: 'Error in ?? at 1, 1: Found / expecting a token name', loc = '/Users/elliot/src/covid-ig/output/Questionnaire-WhoCrQuestionnaireCovid19Surveillance.html#/html/bod', err = 'The image source 'icon-q-dateTime.png' cannot be resolved'

Looking in the output directory, there is an icon-q-datetime.png, but no icon-q-dateTime.png.
@Grahame Grieve, would this be a publisher issue or a template issue?
From what I can tell, the filename in the pubpack has different case than what the publisher (jekyll?) is looking for.
ok I think the next release will fix this
